skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bhagwat gita
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bhagavad Gita is an sacred ancient holy scripture that consists of solution to all our real life problems. Its a conversation that happened between Lord Krishna and his devotte Arjun in middle of a battle called Mahabharat in the holy land of Kurukshetra.

This skills is a audio class of entire 18 chapters of Bhagavad Gita explained by prominent Swamiji's of the ISKCON Foundation.

Currently its supported in following languages

Indian Languages: Sanskrit, Hindi, Marathi, Gujarati, Tamil, Bengali

Foreign Languages: Arabic, English, French, Spanish

At any given point you can switch the languages by saying "Alexa, launch bhagavad gita and switch to English"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
